V

validCIDR(String) - Static method in class org.apache.james.util.CIDR
validCIDR will check the given CIDR string aginst it's defined mask such that the given IPAddress & MASK shall equal 0
example:
255.255.255.16/28 256.256.132.0/11
CIDR = FFFFFF10 CIDR = FFFF8400
MASK = 0000000F MASK = 000007FF
CIDR & MASK == 0 => Good MASK & CIDR !
